definitions: with a lack of restraint in spending money or using resources

examples.text: he lived extravagantly and fell deeply into debt

shortDefinitions: with lack of restraint in spending money or using resources

definitions: in an excessive or elaborate way

examples.text: extravagantly decorated ceilings painted with stars and angels

definitions: to a large degree and with extreme feeling

examples.text: as a child, Mozart was extravagantly praised
he was extravagantly admired for his versatility

shortDefinitions: to large degree and with extreme feeling
